Ollama Toolkit Conventions

This document outlines the conventions used across the Ollama Toolkit.

Model Names

Latest recommended default model is deepseek-r1:1.5b. Other examples:

  • qwen2.5:0.5b

  • nomic-embed-text

The tag is optional and, if not provided, will default to latest. The tag is used to identify a specific version.

Durations

All durations remain in nanoseconds.

Streaming Responses

Set {"stream": true} or {"stream": false} in request JSON.

Certain endpoints stream responses as JSON objects. Streaming can be disabled by providing {"stream": false} for these endpoints.
